phases.name: Discover Movies with High IMDB Ratings
phases.description: This phase discovers movies with the highest imdb ratings.
phases.cypherQuery:
MATCH (item:Movie)
WHERE item.imdbRating IS NOT NULL
RETURN item, item.imdbRating AS score , {} AS details
ORDER BY score DESC

phases.name: Discover Movies Based On Actor Popularity
phases.description: This phase discovers movies with popular actors.
phases.cypherQuery:
MATCH (p:Actor)-->(m:Movie) 
WHERE p.name <> "N/A" 
WITH p.name AS actor, count(m)*1.0/5 AS score, apoc.coll.randomItem(collect(m)) AS item
RETURN item, score, {} AS details LIMIT 50

phases.name: Boost On Release Year
phases.description: Boost on movies released more recently.
phases.cypherQuery:
MATCH (this)
RETURN this as item, -(2024-toInteger(this.year)) AS score,{} as details

phases.name: Exclude Movies Not Available in English Language
phases.description: This phase excludes movies that are not available in english language as these recommendations are geared towards a english speaking audience
phases.cypherQuery:
MATCH (this)
WHERE "English" IN this.languages
RETURN this as item

phases.name: Diversify On Genre
phases.cypherQuery:
OPTIONAL MATCH (this)-[:IN_GENRE]->(g)
WITH this, CASE WHEN g.name IS NOT NULL THEN g.name ELSE "" END AS attribute
RETURN attribute
